sentences.english: So there I was happily pan frying the slabs when I lost my grip on one as I was turning it.
sentences.chinese: 我高興地用煎鍋煎魚片，在翻轉魚片時我失手了。

sentences.english: She forgot to watch the frying pan and the bacon was burned to a frazzle.
sentences.chinese: 她忘了看煎鍋，結果鹹豬肉被煮爛了。

sentences.english: Reduce frying pan heat to low. Add remaining oil to pan.
sentences.chinese: 用中大火在一個大煎鍋內把1湯匙油加熱。

sentences.english: If you do not have a waffle iron, just use a fry pan and cook like a pancake.
sentences.chinese: 若沒有華夫鐵板，可用煎鍋代替，象做薄烤餅那樣。

sentences.english: I scoured the frying pan to remove the grease.
Nancy pours the eggs in a frying pan and sprinkles chopped ham and onions on them.
sentences.chinese: 南茜把雞蛋倒進煎鍋，往上面撒些碎火腿和洋蔥。

sentences.english: Add the vegetable oil to a large heavy-based frying pan and heat over high heat.
sentences.chinese: 在厚底的大煎鍋里加蔬菜油，用大火加熱。

sentences.english: Women in white chef's jackets race around with onions and skillets.
sentences.chinese: 在白色廚師的外套和周圍的種族婦女洋蔥和煎鍋。

sentences.english: Heat sun flower seed oil in a fry pan.
sentences.chinese: 在煎鍋中把葵花籽油加熱。

sentences.english: Put a frying pan on the burner.
The ham frizzled in the frying pan.
sentences.chinese: 火腿在煎鍋中噝噝作響。

sentences.english: Brown the mince in a frying pan.
sentences.chinese: 在煎鍋裏把肉末煎至棕色。

sentences.english: In a saute pan, set over medium-low heat, cook onions until soft.
sentences.chinese: 置一平底煎鍋，中低檔火候，炒洋蔥使其變軟。

sentences.english: Place cumin seeds in a dry sauté pan over medium-high heat.
sentences.chinese: 把孜然粒放入煎鍋，並開到中高火。

sentences.english: There are some eggs cooking in the frying-pan .
sentences.chinese: 在煎鍋裏炒着好些雞蛋。

sentences.english: Stir in vermouth and tomatoes, scraping up any brown bits from bottom of skillet .
sentences.chinese: 把苦艾酒和番茄攪拌，從煎鍋底部抹去少量的棕色物。
